text.quote: 4A*: Clause 1, page 1, line 8, at end insert—

“(3) The Secretary of State shall place in the libraries of both Houses of Parliament, as soon as reasonably practicable and no later than one calendar month from the date of Royal Assent, a detailed assessment of the impact of section 1 on women born between 6 April 1951 and 5 April 1953, with an estimate of the number of these women who will be financially advantaged as a result of derived entitlements.”
